org.lightsleep.component

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightsleep.component.Expression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Condition, SqlComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrderBy.Element

    public class Expression
extends java.lang.Object
implements Condition
    Configures an expression with a string content and an array of argument objects embedded in the string.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo

      • toString

        public <E> java.lang.String toString(Sql<E> sql,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Returns a SQL string representation of this object.
        If uses a parameter character (?) at generating character string, add the parameter object to parameters.
        Conversion Process
        String before convert String after convert
        {} An element of arguments
        {Property Name} Column Name
        {Table Alias.Property Name} Table Alias.Column Name
        {Table Alias_Property Name} Column Alias
        {#Property Name} Property Value of the entity
        Specified by:
        toString in interface SqlComponent
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of the entity
        Parameters:
        sql - the Sql object
        parameters - a list of parameters
        Returns:
        a SQL string representation
        Throws:
        MissingArgumentsException - if the number of arguments does not match the number of placements in the expression
        MissingPropertyException - if a property that does not exist in the expression is referenced
